articles.author: ANDREA RODRÍGUEZ / AP
articles.title: Havana Hotel Death Toll Rises to 30 as Dogs Search for Survivors
articles.description: Search crews with dogs hunted through the ruins of a luxury hotel in Cuba's capital Sunday for survivors of an apparent gas explosion and officials raised the number of known dead to 30.
articles.content:
HAVANA — Search crews with dogs hunted through the ruins of a luxury hotel in Cuba’s capital Sunday for survivors of an apparent gas explosion and officials raised the number of known dead to 30.

articles.author: BOBBY CAINA CALVAN / AP
articles.title: As New Yorkers Emerge From Pandemic, So Do Rodents

articles.author: DARLENE SUPERVILLE / AP
articles.title: Jill Biden Makes Unannounced Visit to Ukraine on Mother’s Day
articles.description: Jill Biden made an unannounced visit to western Ukraine on Sunday, holding a surprise Mother’s Day meeting with first lady Olena Zelenska to show U.S. support for the embattled nation as Russia presses its punishing war in the eastern regions.
